title: Why are we censoring Karthus' face in North America?
body:
Karthus' face was censored in China.

http://i.imgur.com/4G37xeD.png

Karthus was given a visual update. His other skins were not given a splash update (like many other visual updates).

Now that Riot is "unifying" the art we are getting China's stupid censorships. Why are China's censorships being forced upon us in a country where we don't censor these sort of things?!?!??!?! They are giving us the splash arts where they cover up his face for his skins (the old splash arts) and they are blacking out his current face?!??!?!?! 

http://i.imgur.com/dD2L7z8.gifv

WHY RIOT, WE DON'T LIVE IN CHINA WHY ARE YOU CENSORING HIS BEAUTIFUL FACE IN AMERICA.

replies.body:
The real question is why is statue of Karthas being changed, especially to a splash that doesn't even use the statue of liberty's pose. 

Like can we also get an Uncle Ryze update where he is just reading from a scroll or something since Iconic poses for something that is being parodied doesn't matter anymore /s
The real question is why they feel like this unification is necessary???

To be honest - because many players requested the update. In some cases it seems Riot misunderstood it, but it would be little jerky to make new waves of hatred, because that way chances Riot will read boards and care about those little things will be negated even more. Players were now and then complaining (with many upvotes) that some of chinese slpash is better (more up to date) and if they don't want to waste resources on updating some (namely Pharaoh Nidalee), they can simply use the Chinese one. The only one which looks like ridiculous change is Nightraven Fiora. That literally looks like reverting it to older splash. Even the pose looks like the older slpashs.

I would have said it was cause they are using the chinese splashes and will eventually update them to the current standard... but then I saw the change to his current splash...
WTF RITO? HE DOESN'T EVEN HAVE A SKULL FOR A HEAD ANYMORE! WHY IS HE GETTING CENSORED?!
If they really wanted to censor some skulls, they should have another look at {{champion:120}} who literally has 4 SKULLS ON HIS TORSO -__-
It's not about the skull, it's the face of death. It's a Chinese culture thing.
then trust me when I say im shocked they let jhin exist. china does not like the number 4.
Yeah, but that would be like Candy Crush Saga trying to sue for Copyright of the word Saga. You just can't get rid of the number four, because you don't like it's existence.
...if they own the company can't they basically order them to take jhin out? Only reason i could see them not doing that is the community back lash it could cause.

That doesn't work exactly that way. Although Tencent owns RIOT, they don't control nor they don't care about what they do. They only care about profits. They set certain economic goals that have to be met. The way they are met is irrelevant to them. The only situation where I think they would tell off RIOT is if they introduced something very unappropiate like a racist joke within the game.

But Karthus isn't death.
In fact the face of death is seemingly MORE acceptable since riot didn't have to censor the face of grim reaper karthus.

And his ingame model isn't censored either,so I don't know why his splash art would need to be censored
Dude, karthus has a skin where's he's the grim reaper. That's death. And the model isn't art so to them it's not as bad.

> Isn't it because China had a law against showcasing bones?

Interesting to know that laws in China when it comes to bones affect people in the US.  Interesting to remember that China gives no fucks about copyright laws in the US.

Chinese laws don't affect companies outside of China. Riot's product is "sold" in China therefore they have to adhere to their rules in China. The only reason why it's affecting us is because Riot doesn't want to have a different product for each region. You're also wrong about China not caring about US copyright laws. All the Chinese companies that are multi national and have firms in the US and other countries sure as hell abide by those rules. It's the companies that never expand out of China that blatantly break copyright laws.

Actually, no.  Riot isn't selling a different products for each region.  Every region gets the exact same skin.  It's up to the players preference when it comes to the splashes.  And, clearly, the NA server neither wants the "Nightraven" Fiora splash nor the change to Karthus' splash downgrades.
And that's what I was jabbing at when I was talking about copyright laws.

I'm saying that Riot doesn't want to have a different product for any region in anyway possible. They wanto have the same splashes, same lore, same logins, same *everything* for *all* regions. Up until this point part of the product has been different for the regions (splash arts) which is why they're unifying them to be the same.also remember this is a temporary fix until they actually update the splash arts. Also China is losing some of the splash arts they're attached to and love so it isn't a one way street.

Is it a good change? I have no opinion on that, in some cases it's better and in some it's worse, but it's all about personal taste.
